description.value: An extension that pre-adopts R5, changing the string data type of .payload.content to a CodeableConcept.

purpose.value: This extension represents the PayloadContentCodeableConcept concept for implementations following the information standard [CiO](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Contra-indicaties_en_Overgevoeligheden).
